front.title: •Order To Engage
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on opponent's side of table. At the end of each of opponent's battle phases, if a battle did not take place at every location where both players have presence at the end of that phase, opponent loses 3 Force.
front.lore: Political pressure forced the Empire to join battle with the Alliance in otherwise tactically poor situations. Failure to engage the enemy was considered tantamount to treason.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: Order To Engage + All My Urchins The Dark Side player can decide between losing three Force for not battling or losing two Force for attacking.
